Name: Operation STEEL
About the game: Operation STEEL is a roguelike shoot-em-up rendered in beautiful hand-drawn art. Find and upgrade weapons while combatting the electronic legion across the galaxy! Game features: Procedurally generated levels with randomised enemy waves and pickups Branching paths - select from 20+ levels 25+ weird and wonderful bosses 35+ unique weapons and items to find Upgrade your ship between levels at the shop Boss Rush mode Online leaderboards Awesome soundtrack by the amazing Dolphin !
